leader: The Triumvirate (Maagrim Torrn, Khandar’aashta, and Daric Velderan)
characteristics: The youngest of the Dragonmarked Houses and hasn’t embraced all of the customs of the Twelve
Heirs often use family names instead of the house surname
Many hold on to beliefs and traditions carried from the Shadow Marches — like the druidic faith of the Gatekeepers or secretive cults of the Dragon Below
prompts: Are you a part of House Tharashk? If so, do you bear the Mark of Finding? Or do you bear the Mark without being a member of the House?
If you are in the house, what is your role? What is your opinion of the House?
Where you exiled from your house?
How do you use your mark if you have one?
Are you a bounty hunter/body guard?
Being the youngest house, what are your opinions of the other houses? Do they seek too much power? Are they too powerful?
What are your connections to any druids or cultists of the Shadow Marches?
